skill.name: torchdrug
skill.description: Graph-based drug discovery toolkit. Molecular property prediction (ADMET), protein modeling, knowledge graph reasoning, molecular generation, retrosynthesis, GNNs (GIN, GAT, SchNet), 40+ datasets, for PyTorch-based ML on molecules, proteins, and biomedical graphs.
skill.summary: Graph-based drug discovery toolkit. Molecular property prediction (ADMET), protein modeling, knowled...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No code execution, network access, or file system access patterns were found. The content is documentation and examples for TorchDrug usage only.

content.value_statement: You need clear guidance for molecular and protein ML tasks. This skill provides TorchDrug workflows, model choices, and dataset pointers.
actual_capabilities: Explain TorchDrug dataset choices for molecular, protein, and knowledge graph tasks
Outline model selection among GIN, GAT, SchNet, GearNet, and KG embeddings
Provide step guidance for property prediction, interaction prediction, and KG completion
Describe molecular generation workflows including GCPN and flow models
Detail retrosynthesis pipelines with center identification and synthon completion
limitations: Does not run training or download datasets
Requires TorchDrug and related libraries to be installed by the user
Cannot validate wet lab outcomes or experimental feasibility
Does not replace domain expert review for drug design decisions

use_cases.title: Plan ADMET prediction
use_cases.description: Choose datasets and models for BBBP or Tox21 property prediction workflows.

use_cases.title: Model protein function
use_cases.description: Select protein datasets and sequence or structure models for function prediction.

use_cases.title: Build KG reasoning
use_cases.description: Set up knowledge graph completion with RotatE or ComplEx on Hetionet.

prompt_templates.title: Start with property prediction
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me a simple TorchDrug workflow for BBBP property prediction and model selection guidance.

prompt_templates.title: Protein task planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare ESM and GearNet for protein function prediction and recommend datasets to start.

prompt_templates.title: Knowledge graph setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Explain how to train a knowledge graph completion model on Hetionet and what metrics to report.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced retrosynthesis
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline a full retrosynthesis pipeline using center identification and synthon completion with evaluation steps.

output_examples.input: Help me pick a model and dataset for molecular toxicity prediction.
output: Use Tox21 or ToxCast for toxicity benchmarks
Start with GIN or GAT for molecular graphs
Report AUROC and AUPRC with scaffold split

best_practices: Use scaffold splits for realistic molecular evaluation
Match model input dimensions to dataset feature dimensions
Validate generated molecules for chemical validity and uniqueness
anti_patterns: Training on random splits for drug discovery claims
Ignoring missing labels in multi label datasets

faq.question: Is this compatible with PyTorch projects?
faq.answer: Yes. It targets TorchDrug workflows built on PyTorch.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It provides guidance only and does not run training or downloads.

faq.question: Can I integrate RDKit or AlphaFold?
faq.answer: Yes. The guidance includes integration patterns for RDKit and AlphaFold.

faq.question: Does it access my data or keys?
faq.answer: No. It does not read files or environment variables.

faq.question: What if I get dimension mismatch errors?
faq.answer: Check model input dimensions against dataset feature sizes.

faq.question: How does it compare to general ML help?
faq.answer: It is specialized for TorchDrug datasets, models, and tasks.
